com.opengamma.strata.pricer.fxopt

Interface InterpolatedSmileDeltaTermStructure

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SmileDeltaTermStructure
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InterpolatedSmileDeltaTermStructureStrikeInterpolation

    public interface InterpolatedSmileDeltaTermStructure
extends SmileDeltaTermStructure
    An interpolated term structure of smile as used in Forex market.

    The term structure defined here is composed of smile descriptions at different times. The data of each smile contains delta and volatility in SmileDeltaParameters. The delta values must be common to all of the smiles.

    This interface in particular defines interpolation in the time dimension given a set of interpolator and extrapolators. Smile construction methodology of each time slice is specified in a subclass.
